price: በመጥፎም የመጡ ሰዎች ፊቶቻቸው በእሳት ውስጥ ይደፋሉ፡፡ «ትሠሩት የነበራችሁትን እንጅ አትመነዱም» (ይባላሉ)፡፡
arabic: وَمَن جَآءَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ فَكُبَّتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فِي ٱلنَّارِ هَلۡ تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman jāa bil-sayi-ati fakubbat wujūhuhum fī al-nāri hal tuj'zawna illā mā kuntum taʿmalūna
